<p> HAnim CharactersLegacy are HAnim1 X3D3 models conforming to version 1 of the <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19774/V1.0/index.html" target="_blank">Humanoid Animation (HAnim)&nbsp;International Standard, ISO&mdash;IEC&nbsp;14774:2019</a>. </p> <p> TODO: work in progress is converting HAnim1 models to HAnim2, testing <a href="../X3dResources.html#QualityAssurance" target="_blank">X3D Quality Assurance (QA)</a> conformance, and upgrading <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/stylesheets/X3dTidy.html" target="_blank">X3dTidy stylesheet</a> cleanup capabilities. See <a href="../build.X3dSchematronX3dTidy.log.txt" target="_blank">build.X3dSchematronX3dTidy.log.txt</a> and <a href="../build.log.txt" target="_blank">build.log.txt</a> for current status. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest, in hierarchical order: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#HAnimHumanoid" target="_blank">HAnimHumanoid</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#HAnimJoint" target="_blank">HAnimJoint</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#HAnimSegment" target="_blank">HAnimSegment</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#HAnimSite" target="_blank">HAnimSite</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#HAnimDisplacer" target="_blank">HAnimDisplacer</a> (no support for <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#HAnimMotion" target="_blank">HAnimMotion</a>). </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19774/V1.0/index.html" target="_blank">Humanoid animation (HAnim) version&nbsp;1</a> International Standard. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Architecture Specification</a> version&nbsp;3.3 section of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3Dv4Draft/ISO-IEC19775-1v4-WD2/Part01/components/hanim.html" target="_blank">26 Humanoid Animation (HAnim) component</a>. </p>
